1. ''' Use kernel version 2.6.21 or later '''
   a. Run command '' uname -a '' and note kernel version.

1. ''' Enable tickless idle '''
   a. Run command '' grep CONFIG_NO_HZ /boot/config-$(uname -r) '' return should be: CONFIG_NO_HZ=y
